contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox building |name = X Condominium |image = X Condominium Toronto 2011.jpg |image_size = 200px |caption = X Condominium in 2011 |antenna_spire = {{convert|148.55|m|ft|abbr=on}} |location = 110 Charles Street E.<br/>[[Toronto]], [[Ontario]] |latd = 43.670145 |longd = -79.380269 |iso_region = CA-ON |coordinates_display= title |roof = |floor_count = 45 (topped out as of October 31, 2009) |completion_date = 2010 |floor_area = |developer = [[Great Gulf Homes]] |status = Complete |architect = [[Peter Clewes]] of [[architectsAlliance]] |main_contractor = |building_type = [[Residential]] }} '''X Condominium''' is a high-rise condominium building located at 110 Charles Street E. near the intersection of Bloor and Jarvis in downtown [[Toronto, Canada|Toronto]], [[Ontario]], [[Canada]] by [[Great Gulf Homes]].<ref name="Emporis Listing">[http://www.emporis.com/application/?nav=building&id=231515 Emporis Listing]</ref> ==Architecture== Designed by [[Peter Clewes]] of [[architectsAlliance]], this residential structure is 137 metres tall with 44 floors and 437 suites.<ref name="Urban Reality">[http://urbanrealtytoronto.com/wordpress/2007/06/11/x-condominium-590-jarvis-street UrbanRealtyToronto]</ref> The retro-[[International style (architecture)|International style]] structure is clad with dark glass and was designed to pay homage to the German architect [[Ludwig Mies van der Rohe]], designer of the [[TD Centre]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== {{Commonscat}} *[http://www.xcondos.com |Official Website] {{Toronto skyscrapers}} [[Category:Residential skyscrapers in Toronto]] [[Category:Skyscrapers between 100 and 149 meters]] [[Category:Modernist architecture in Canada]] [[Category:Buildings and structures under construction]] [[Category:Residential buildings completed in 2010]] {{Toronto-stub}}
